channel.title: RuneTrinity 317
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/1rahzb.gif[/img] [U]Rune-Trinity By Luke[/U] [/center]
[B][U]Introduction[/U][/B] [I]Hey, I am Luke, This project has just been restarted as finally i am having some success with actually sticking to the development of this server, sorry i did not post before, but i have been working on the server. This topic is soley for the development of Rune-Trinity Server.[/I]
[B][U]Beta Testing[/U][/B] [I]The server will be beta tested when I feel theres enough content in the server.[/I]
[B][U]Current Progress[/U][/B]
[I]Here are the features from when the thread was first posted.[/I] [CODE]Login Walking Multiplayer Emote update mask PVP - * facing * good delays * Alot of weapon anims Anti-NoCLIP(worldmap) << still need to implement! Character appearence - * change at first login * saving * loading Single-Thread-Per-Client EventManager Correct combat calculations (level) Banking NPCs - * spawn npcs * they walk Magic - * bones to bannanas! Skills - * Woodcutting - Reqiured levels & axes - Tree falls down - Tree regrows - Face the tree - oak+ randomly fall down * Firemaking - Reqiured levels to light - Global fire objects - Multi fire - Fire burns out and leaves ashes - Random delays [/CODE]
[I]Here is the update blog[/I]
[code] Thursday 16th of april - 16:11 - I am writing the thread. Friday 17th of april - 14:34 - PVN - * facing * good delays * Alot of weapon anims * random drops + bones * npc follows player if running away Weapon Interfaces (combat sidebar) Levelup interfaces Global items NPC dialouge Friday 17th of april 18:35 - npc range - * arrow bonuses * level bonuses * bow bonuses * projectiles * 20 exp per hit (5 xp on hp) * arrows drop on floor pvp range - * arrow bonuses * level bonuses * bow bonuses * projectiles * 20 exp per hit (5 xp on hp) * arrows drop on floor Thieving - * all pickpocketing - Stun + GFX + emotes - Hit if fail [/code]
[B][U]Pictures[/U][/B](LOTS OF MOVING IMAGES) Char design screen [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2vs3o0x.gif[/img] Firemaking [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2j47oeh.gif[/img] Woodcutting [img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/9600/woodcutting.gif[/img] PVP [img]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/3423/pvp.gif[/img] Combat sidebar interfaces [img]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/589/weaponinterfaces.png[/img] Level up interfaces [IMG]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/6789/levelupinterfaces.png[/img] NPCDialouge (SAYS runescape because thats the default server name) [img]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/5681/dialouges.png[/img] PVN [IMG]http://img408.imageshack.us/img408/3423/pvp.gif[/img] NPC RANGE [img]http://img242.imageshack.us/img242/3143/npcrange.gif[/img] PVP RANGE [img]http://img512.imageshack.us/img512/8245/pvprange.gif[/img] Thieving [img]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/6053/thieving.png[/img] MORE TO COME!
[U][B]Videos[/B][/U] [I]Videos will be posted shortly![/I]
[B][U]Credits[/U][/B] - Patrick - keeping me company :D - Abyssal - ^ ^ - Richard - for being the king of all stoopys and saying stupid stufffs
I will add more credits as i progress.
Thank-you for reading.

item.title: RuneTrinity 317
item.dc:creator: @Gozun Gozun
item.description:
@Gozun wrote:

[center]

Rune-Trinity By Luke
[/center]

Introduction
Hey, I am Luke, This project has just been restarted as finally i am having some success with actually sticking to the development of this server, sorry i did not post before, but i have been working on the server. This topic is soley for the development of Rune-Trinity Server.

Beta Testing
The server will be beta tested when I feel theres enough content in the server.

Current Progress

Here are the features from when the thread was first posted.

[CODE]Login
Walking
Multiplayer
Emote update mask
PVP -

  • facing
  • good delays
  • Alot of weapon anims
    Anti-NoCLIP(worldmap) << still need to implement!
    Character appearence -
  • change at first login
  • saving
  • loading
    Single-Thread-Per-Client
    EventManager
    Correct combat calculations (level)
    Banking
    NPCs -
  • spawn npcs
  • they walk
    Magic -
  • bones to bannanas!
    Skills -
  • Woodcutting
  • Reqiured levels & axes
  • Tree falls down
  • Tree regrows
  • Face the tree
  • oak+ randomly fall down
  • Firemaking
  • Reqiured levels to light
  • Global fire objects
  • Multi fire
  • Fire burns out and leaves ashes
  • Random delays
    [/CODE]

Here is the update blog

Thursday 16th of april - 16:11 -
I am writing the thread.
Friday 17th of april - 14:34 -
PVN -
 * facing
 * good delays
 * Alot of weapon anims
 * random drops + bones
 * npc follows player if running away
Weapon Interfaces (combat sidebar)
Levelup interfaces
Global items
NPC dialouge
Friday 17th of april 18:35 -
npc range -
 * arrow bonuses
 * level bonuses
 * bow bonuses
 * projectiles
 * 20 exp per hit (5 xp on hp)
 * arrows drop on floor
pvp range -
 * arrow bonuses
 * level bonuses
 * bow bonuses
 * projectiles
 * 20 exp per hit (5 xp on hp)
 * arrows drop on floor
Thieving -
 * all pickpocketing
  - Stun + GFX + emotes
  - Hit if fail

Pictures(LOTS OF MOVING IMAGES)
Char design screen

Firemaking

Woodcutting

PVP

Combat sidebar interfaces

Level up interfaces

NPCDialouge (SAYS runescape because thats the default server name)

PVN

NPC RANGE

PVP RANGE

Thieving

MORE TO COME!

Videos
Videos will be posted shortly!

Credits

  • Patrick - keeping me company
  • Abyssal - ^ ^
  • Richard - for being the king of all stoopys and saying stupid stufffs

I will add more credits as i progress.

Thank-you for reading.
